faq.question: What makes your matcha 'not-as-bitter'?
faq.answer: We use only ceremonial-grade matcha from Uji, Kyoto, which is naturally sweeter and less bitter than culinary grade. Our careful preparation at the right temperature (175°F) preserves the delicate flavors.

faq.question: Do you offer dairy-free options?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer oat milk, coconut milk, and almond milk alternatives for all our drinks at no extra charge for most options.

faq.question: What is ceremonial grade matcha?
faq.answer: Ceremonial grade is the highest quality matcha, made from the youngest tea leaves with stems and veins removed. It has a vibrant green color, smooth texture, and naturally sweet taste.

faq.question: Can I order online for pickup?
faq.answer: Yes! You can order through our website for pickup, or use DoorDash, UberEats, or Grubhub for delivery.

faq.question: Do you offer catering services?
faq.answer: We offer catering for events with a minimum order of 10 drinks. Please contact us at hello@olyncha.com for more information.

faq.question: Are your drinks sweetened?
faq.answer: Our pure matcha drinks are unsweetened by default. You can add natural sweeteners like honey or maple syrup upon request.
